description: TEHRAN- Egypt has formed a crisis group to monitor the developments following Iran's retaliation to the Israeli attack on the Iranian consulate in Syria on April 1.
title: Egypt forms crisis group as Iran launches legitimate attack on Israel

description: TEHRAN - Iran has warned Israel against reacting to the drone and missile attacks that targeted occupied territories on Saturday night in response to Israel's strike on Iran's embassy in Damascus.
title: Iran to respond "more severely" if Israel reacts to embassy attack retaliation

description: Citing army sources, Reuters reported that Syria has put its Russian-made Pantsir ground-to-air defense systems on high alert around the capital Damascus and major bases in the event of Israeli strikes.
title: Syria puts ground-to-air defense systems on high alert

description: TEHRAN - Amid escalating tensions, an Iranian military source has suggested that Jordan may face severe repercussions and become the next target if it aligns with the Zionist regime.
title: Iran warns Jordan it may be next target if it cooperates with Israel

description: TEHRAN- The Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) has issued a statement announcing the firing of dozens of drones and missiles against targets inside Israel in response to its "numerous crimes" including its air raids on the   consular section of the Iranian embassy in Damascus, Syria, on April 1 in which seven Iranian military officers were martyred.
title: Dozens of drones, missiles fired at occupied territories: IRGC

description: TEHRAN – Following Iran’s legitimate defense in response to Israel’s unlawful attack on the consular section of the Iranian embassy in Damascus on April one, the occupation regime’s cabinet held a meeting in a hiding place in the war ministry.
title: Israel’s war cabinet convenes at hiding place

description: TEHRAN - In a stark declaration, Iran's Defense Minister has issued a stern warning to nations aligning with Israel, cautioning that any countries abetting Israel in a possible attack on Iran would receive a decisive response from the Islamic Republic.
title: Defense minister warns countries supporting Israel

description: TEHRAN - Iran has launched retaliatory attacks against the occupied territories, after the Israeli regime struck the country's embassy in Damuscas on April 1, killing 7 high-ranking military officials.
title: Israel getting punished with ‘Operation Truthful Promise’

description: Ghassan Abu-Sittah, a British Palestinian doctor who volunteered in Gaza hospitals during the first weeks of Israel’s war, says he was denied entry to Germany after being interrogated at the airport and banned from participating in a conference where he was scheduled to give testimony of his experience in the Strip.
title: British-Palestinian doctor: Germany trying to ‘silence’ witnesses

description: Protesters have marched through the streets of New York in a demonstration calling for an end to the war in Gaza.
title: New York protesters demand end to Gaza war

description: Ireland is close to formally recognizing a Palestinian State and would like to do so in concert with Spain and other like-minded countries, new Prime Minister, Simon Harris, said on Friday after meeting his Spanish counterpart, Middle East Monitor reports.
title: Ireland says moving closer to recognizing Palestinian State

description: Waterborne diseases are spreading in Gaza due to the lack of clean water and rising temperatures, the United Nations Humanitarian Coordinator in Gaza said on Friday, Reuters reports.
title: UN says waterborne illnesses spread in Gaza due to unsafe water

description: A man stabbed six people to death at a busy Sydney shopping center Saturday before he was fatally shot, police said.
title: Six dead in mass stabbing at Sydney shopping center

description: The former commander of the UK's Joint Forces Command has warned that Ukraine could face defeat by Russia in 2024.
title: UK general: Ukraine could face defeat in 2024

description: TEHRAN- Rights lawyers have filed a new lawsuit against a German government decision to approve the shipment of thousands of weapons to the Israeli occupation forces.
title: Germany faces fresh lawsuit over arms to Israeli military

description: TEHRAN - Siasat-e-Rooz devoted its editorial to the reaction of the West to the Israeli terrorist attack on the Iranian embassy in Syria and wrote: If this attack had been carried out by Iran, the Western countries of America, Canada, England, France, Germany and the entire European Union By issuing harsh statements, they would have condemned Iran's action, and by calling for a meeting of the United Nations and its Security Council, they not only condemned Iran but also demanded international punishment of Iran by the United Nations and the Security Council.
title: Supporters of Israel have begged

description: TEHRAN - Turkmenistan's president has conveyed his heartfelt congratulations to Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi on the occasion of Eid al-Fitr.
title: Turkmenistan president extends warm Eid wishes to Raisi

description: TEHRAN- A spokesperson for the U.S. State Department announced that Washington is reviewing the process of Iranian sanctions exemptions following the expiration of waivers under the 2015 Iran nuclear deal framework.
title: U.S. reviewing process of Iranian sanctions exemptions

description: TEHRAN - In a recent statement, Deputy Speaker of the Iranian Parliament, Mojtaba Zolnouri, asserted the importance of maintaining the right to retaliate against the Zionists amidst escalating tensions.
title: MP stresses Iran’s commitment to retaliate against Israel

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian has urged Italy to work toward putting an end to Israel’s war crimes and genocide in the Gaza Strip and the occupied West Bank.
title: Iran urges Italy to work toward putting stop to Israeli massacre in Gaza

description: TEHRAN- China has demanded that the U.S. take “a constructive role” in the West Asian region, and denounced the Israeli attack on Iran’s diplomatic facilities in Syria.
title: China denounces attack on Iran embassy, calls on U.S. to act responsibly

description: TEHRAN – The Special Naval Forces of the Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) executed a significant operation on Saturday, seizing the Israel-linked MSC Aries container ship near the Strait of Hormuz, according to the official news agency IRNA.
title: IRGC seizes Israel-linked ship near Strait of Hormuz

description: TEHRAN - In the past few days, as Israel has been awaiting a retaliation from Tehran in response to its April 1 attack on the Iranian embassy in Damascus, Western media outlets have become deranged in trying to “keep the situation calm” in West Asia.
title: Will Iranian restraint prevent a ‘wider war’?

description: TEHRAN - Brutal settler violence has sharply escalated in the occupied West Bank since Israel launched war on the Gaza Strip on October 7.
title: Israel incites settler violence to ethnically cleanse West Bank

description: TEHRAN- While the American public opinion clearly dislikes wars, certain warmongers in Washington DC are pushing for robust American support for Israeli adventurism in the West Asia region.
title: The Israeli burden weighs on American shoulders

description: TEHRAN-The play “An Ordinary Circuit” written by Jean-Claude Carrière will be staged at Tehran’s City Theater Complex from April 18.
title: City Theater to host Jean-Claude Carrière’s “An Ordinary Circuit”

description: TEHRAN- A memorial installation honoring the children martyred in Gaza, titled "Ten Thousand Worlds," is currently on display at the Tehran Museum of Contemporary Art (TMCA).
title: Memorial installation honors Gaza's martyred children at Tehran museum

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian football premier league, known as the Persian Gulf Pro League (IPGL), is nearing its seven final stretches with what appears to be a two-horse race for the championship title.
title: Esteghlal, Persepolis in PGPL two-horse title race

description: TEHRAN- Throughout history, humans have harbored a fascination with envisioning the world of tomorrow and its potential appearance, a concept that has been imaginatively translated into literature through the genre of science fiction. Unlike utopian visions, sci-fi narratives frequently paint a future that is far from peaceful and perfect, often portraying scenarios involving alien invasions, malevolent empires, authoritarian dystopias, and the exploration and colonization of new territories – which can sometimes more closely resemble the past than the future.
title: Science Fiction: a fanciful way to tell stories of colonialism : Part 1

description: TEHRAN - In a bid to expand the market for Iranian handicrafts, Farzad Owjani, who presides over the tourism ministry’s department for marketing and commercialization of handicrafts, has highlighted China as a potential major destination for exports.
title: Iranian handicrafts eyeing Chinese market

description: TEHRAN – Situated in the eastern part of Iran, South Khorasan holds 14 approved target destination villages, which makes the province a delightful station for travel lovers.
title: South Khorasan shines bright with rural  destinations

description: TEHRAN - Following the exodus from Africa around 70,000 years ago, early humans established a significant presence on what is now known as the Iranian Plateau, according to a new study.
title: Early humans lived on Iranian Plateau for 20,000 years after leaving Africa, study suggests

description: TEHRAN – As this year’s UN Tourism deadline to submit applications for the best tourism villages evaluation draws near [April 24], Iran has nominated eight most qualified villages to vie for global recognition.
title: Iran’s rural tourism: eight villages vie for UN recognition

description: TEHRAN – For millennia, the migration of Iranian tribes alongside their livestock in search of fresh grazing pastures remains an exemplar of coexistence with nature.
title: A peek into nomadic footsteps

description: TEHRAN – Iran were defeated by the Netherlands 61-53 at the 2024 International Wheelchair Basketball Federation (IWBF) Men's Repechage on Saturday.
title: Iran lose to Netherlands at 2024 IWBF Men's Repechage

description: A cultural and recreational festival was held on Friday on the shores of Lake Urmia with the participation of people from all walks of life to celebrate the relative revival of the Lake thanks to recent precipitations.
title: Lake Urmia festival held to celebrate revival

description: TEHRAN –Since the beginning of the current water year (September 23, 2023), the country has received 150.2 mm of rainfall representing a 20.7 percent decrease compared to the long-term average of 189.3 mm, according to Metrological Organization.
title: Rainfall drops by over 20% in long term

description: TEHRAN –The vaccination program against pneumococcal and rotavirus will focus on tropical and southern regions of the country, an official with the health ministry has said.
title: Pneumococcal, rotavirus vaccination to target high-risk provinces

description: TEHRAN –The World Food Program (WFP) has released a report, expounding on activities in Iran over the month of February.
title: WFP releases February report on Iran

description: TEHRAN – The Head of Shrimp and Marine Aquatic Affairs of Iran Fisheries Organization (IFO) Ghobad Mokarami has said the country’s fishery production is expected to reach 206,000 tons in the next two years.
title: Iran’s fishery output to reach 206,000 tons in 2 years

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s hydroelectric power plants are completely ready to supply electricity during the summer peak consumption period, an official with Iran Water & Power Resources Development Company (IWPCO) said.
title: Hydropower plants ready for summer peak period: IWPCO

description: TEHRAN - The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) in its latest monthly report has said that Iran’s oil production volume increased by 28,000 barrels per day (bpd) in March 2024.
title: Iran’s oil price, output surge in March 2024: OPEC

description: TEHRAN - TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), fell 53,919 points to 2,207,980 on Saturday, which is the first day of the Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX falls nearly 54,000 points on Saturday

description: TEHRAN – A few months after signing a Free Trade Agreement with the Eurasian Economic Union (EAEU), Iran’s Ambassador to Moscow Kazem Jalali has announced the Islamic Republic is seeking to gain observer status in the union soon.
title: Iran eyeing observer status in Eurasian Economic Union

description: BEIJING- The State Council Information Office of the People’s Republic of China held a press conference on high-quality development in the southeastern Fujian province on Monday (April 8).
title: China’s Fujian province high quality development discussed in press conference

description: TEHRAN – Iranian international winger Alireza Jahanbakhsh is happy after making his 100th appearance for Feyenoord.
title: Jahanbakhsh thrilled to reach milestone in Feyenoord
Commander affirms readiness of operational units to counter threats
